title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.9 - Disposition of offsite property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.9 - Disposition of offsite property

State Regulations

Demolition of buildings and disposition of offsite
property should be accomplished as soon as possible so that the authority is
relieved of this extra responsibility and that any expenses in connection with
the offsite property, including real estate taxes, can be eliminated. Reduction
in real estate taxes, if applicable, should be obtained when a building has
been demolished. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
